name: Scrap Divers
description:
Dive into an incredibly fast-paced and beautifully crafted retro runner! Control your robot with just a finger to dodge sawblades, flames and many other dangerous obstacles while flying through an infinite tunnel. Are you ready for the drop? Parachute not included.

Features:
• Accessible yet hard to master gameplay - compete with the world for the longest fall
• Amazing pixel art visuals combined with rocking chiptune to keep you immersed
• A roster of 15 playable robots, each one with unique abilities and challenges
• 8 diverse environments full of hazards to overcome with a secret reward waiting at the end
